data.oai_dc:dc: SSR alleles at 23 loci for 280 tea accessions from 8 countries in Africa. Missing data points are denoted by a zero ("0")

The Excel file has 49 columns, the first three columns show the serial number, sample ID, and country of origin respectively while the rest 46 columns depict the 23 SSR loci. Missing data points are denoted by "0".
African tea|Breeding improvement|Genetic diversity|nSSR markers|Chloroplast DNA (cpDNA) regions
